thread.title: Firefighter who died in 1940 brush fire to be added to list
thread.title_full: Firefighter who died in 1940 brush fire to be added to list - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Firefighter who died in 1940 brush fire to be added to list
text:
NASHUA, N.H. (AP) - An upcoming memorial service for fallen firefighters in Nashua will include the name of one who died at the scene of a brush fire in 1940.
Susan Rockwell was researching family history when she came across the details of the death of her grandfather, Chief Engineer William Whitney. She looked into the history of firefighters who had died in the line of duty in Nashua and found he wasn't included.
Rockwell contacted the Nashua Fireman's Relief Association and asked if Whitney's name could be added to the list. The association confirmed the story through its own research and is adding the name, which includes 20 firefighters.
The service is scheduled for Sunday.
